title: Arnold Palmer Invitational odds: Who are favourites to win 2022 tournament?

sentence: +3 View gallery Matt Fitzpatrick was shaken after a phone call with his ex-girlfriend who was born in Ukraine +3 View gallery He no longer wants to be so hard on himself as he looks to shine at this year's majors ‘I’d already decided to be a little easier on myself this year and appreciate all that I have but that phone call just emphasised I don’t want to be miserable for the rest of my life worrying about winning golf tournaments.
title: Matt Fitzpatrick left shaken after a call with his ex-girlfriend who was born in Ukraine

sentence: “It’s gusting, and then there’s no wind,” Englishman Matthew Fitzpatrick said.

title: The Masters is supposed to be gorgeous and genteel. This year, it’s a brute.
